title: Riot Appreciation

replies.body: I raised two tickets with riot support about bugs where i couldn't reconnect to a game i'd been disconnected from and ended up in a leaver buster queue, **never heard back**
Are you sure? I looked into your account to find out why this happened but I found both your tickets were replied to within 24 hours.
Riot Gehirn is MVP support. Cheers to you bud. Hope you eventually got that cookie ;)

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Good work Rito!

Thanks for the kind words guys - it does mean a lot to hear!

Let me also say that I really appreciate all of you too :)  It really helps that you are such a passionate community of players - and it makes it all worth it to work on bettering League, on your behalf.

Cheers!

Here's to the team at Riot. For a large portion, a lot of companies ignore the OCE scene. Riot have come a long way to making other companies see that we actually exist out here. Taking over Luna Park? Organising direct satellite feed to Hoyts cinemas? Plus just being awesome people. They definitely deserve praise and a lot less flak than they usually get. You all rock.
